reviews.name: nr 1 shrek fan
reviews.title: Best movie ever!!!
reviews.text: Its funny, stupid and gross. I love it!

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: Fun for kids and adults!
reviews.text: The jokes for adults that go over the kids heads make this a great movie for the entire family, so long as your kids don't ask you why you're laughing.

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: I own several Shrek shirts because of this movie
reviews.text: What the title said

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: This one is somehow better than the first one
reviews.text: If you thought the fisrt Shrek movie was good, you have not seen the second. Its funnier, wilder and somehow more innapropriate than the first.

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: Writing this at 3 am
reviews.text: Is it the best movie ive seen? No. Will i be able to sleep tonight? No.

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: Nicolas Cage was in this movie?
reviews.text: The SFX team made Cage look unrecogniceable and his amazing performance only made it better! A must if you like horror.

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: Funny
reviews.text: A classic, I think the donkey is annoying but i like the rest. I hope he isn't in the sequel.

reviews.name: nr 1 shrek fan
reviews.title: I changed my mind, this one is the best movie ever
reviews.text: Its funnier, stupider and grosser than the first one! A masterpiece!

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: oooo Spooky
reviews.text: I understand why people say they're dissapointed but i don't agree, Lilly-Rose Depp plays Ellen imaculately and nothing could make me dislike Bill Skarsg√•rds count Orlok.

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: I'm dissapionted
reviews.text: There's only one kind of movie thats worse than a bad one; a mediocre one.

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: Very good
reviews.text: Im not surprised this movie won A oscar but All of them? Sure.

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: I watched it at leat 4 times
reviews.text: Fantastic Spectacular give me 14 more

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: Im now scared of nicholas cage living in my basement
reviews.text: A solid 3 from me, a good scary movie but not anything special

reviews.name: Geek Barbie
reviews.title: I owe Greta Gerwig my life
reviews.text: :O

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: I think i need a pink cowboy hat
reviews.text: I want to buy a pink house and a pink car and a pink fridge

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: I have no idea what I just watched
reviews.text: I think I need a week to process what I just watched, but yeah you should see it if you like body horror.

reviews.name: nr 1 shrek fan
reviews.title: I wish I hadn't watched this movie
reviews.text: I kind of wanted to puke after watching this, I need to watch Shrek 2 as a palete cleanser

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: Worste movie I've seen in a while
reviews.text: It's just boring and bad, not worth the time and OH ITS 2,5 HOURS LONG

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: Women :(
reviews.text: Beautifully acted, written, directed, and the costumes?? Fantastic!

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: A very good adaptation of the book
reviews.text: A must watch if you like the book

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: Hey... What?
reviews.text: The fisrt half was a 4, the second a 2. I don't know what else to say. But let Robert Pattinson play more weird guys, ho does it so well!

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: The pope died a day after I watched this... Should I be worried?
reviews.text: It's a very well directed and acted movie, much more tense than I expected.

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: Probably the best movie I've seen
reviews.text: You spend the whole movie sitting on the edge of your seat, never knowing whats going to happen next. Fantastic acting and directing. 5 stars!

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: The subtitles are DEFINITELY worth it
reviews.text: Bong Joon-ho can do no wrong, his oscars speech was incredible

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: I love watching insane people do insane people thing
reviews.text: Put your hand up if you did NOT expect a man living in the basement

reviews.name: GlizzyLizzy
reviews.title: I love the 90s
reviews.text: Blade is so unseriously serious and so seriously good I don't think I could think of a sigle bad thing to say.

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: CGI so bad it's amazing
reviews.text: If you want to watch a gory, funny, and wildly 90's super hero movie this one is the one. Some of the jokes have aged poorly but you can't escape that with an almost 30 year old movie.

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: Never seen a super hero movie like this before
reviews.text: Watched this in cinema with my dad and we both loved it

reviews.name: GlizzyLizzy
reviews.title: No other movie can do it like this one
reviews.text: Ru Pauls character in this movie scares me to my bones, but a movie dosen't become a classic without reason. Its funny, charming and increadibly satirical of other teen rom-coms of its time. A great watch!

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: I had more fun than my kids had
reviews.text: Watched this with my kids for the first time and they found it a bit boring, but I couldn't care less. It's a really funny movie with an increadibly lovable cast and it's great nostalgia to see it again. If it was up to me id give it a 4, but they insist it was just a 3!

reviews.name: Rebecca
reviews.title: My faourite childhood movie
reviews.text: I loved is as a kid and I watched it so many times I ruined the tape. If that's mot a sign of a good movie I don't know what is.

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: Visualy stunning, lackin plotwise
reviews.text: It's one of those movies that you leave feeling as if the creators came up with the plot just to have an excuse to make a bunch of pretty shots.

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: Too long
reviews.text: The acting and visuals are very stylized and I had a hard time finding myself in it, but im impressed of the attention to details.

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: I think it was good but I'm too dumb to say why
reviews.text: The animation is incredible and I was very immersed in the story as I was watching it, but afterwards I felt more confused than anything else.

reviews.name: GlizzyLizzy
reviews.title: Watch But I'm a Cheerleader instead
reviews.text: At it's time I'm sure this movie was groundbreaking, but coming back 40 years later it just feels somewhat bland

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: Must watch
reviews.text: A movie that shaped a generation and changed hollywood forever!

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: Childhood favourite
reviews.text: This was my favourite movie as a kid and I still think it holds up well even though I'm an adult now.

reviews.name: GlizzyLizzy
reviews.title: I get why people love it...
reviews.text: ...It's just not a story for me. I didn't have any special relationship to this movie as a kid and i think thats why I'm very neutral about it still.

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: Why can't holywood make more movies like this?!
reviews.text: Meryl Streep plays her character so well that I think she actually is that evil in real life, no one can act that well. Beside Streep's performance its a really solid movie that I HIGHLY recomend any rom-com fan to watch!

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: I liked it but it's not Wes Andersson's best movie
reviews.text: It's a fun movie and I enjoyed my time in the theater but I'm probably going to have forgotten most of the plot in about a week

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: Too much and not enough all at once
reviews.text: There's too much going on for me to be able to really get attatched to any of the characters or stories.

reviews.name: GlizzyLizzy
reviews.title: Very blond very legal
reviews.text: Had very fun watching this movie with my firnds, now we all want to become hot and work in law

reviews.name: Jessica
reviews.title: Very bad depiction of law school
reviews.text: I maybe stupidly went in thinking there was going to be more legal drama than personal drama, so I was a little dissapointed

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: Stunning visuals, traumaticed me as a child
reviews.text: Did I understand the cultural references? No. Am I scared? Yes. Did I enjoy the movie? I don't know.

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: In Haiao Miyazaki we trust
reviews.text: Beutifull, stunning, gorgeous! The story is gripping and the complex storytelling makes this a mustwatch for any movie buff

reviews.name: GlizzyLizzy
reviews.title: To-To-Ro Totoro
reviews.text: This is one of my favourite movies and I don't care that its made for children. I cry everytime

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: A great movie for kids and adults alike!
reviews.text: The animation is beautiful and the music is just as lovely. It's a heartwarming story and I think anyone would love it.

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: How did this movie not make more money???
reviews.text: It's insane how such a fantastic movie can get so little regonicion. The acting is fenominal and the production and directing is equally as fantastic. One of the best sci-fi movies I watched this year.

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: Not enough tempo to keep your attention
reviews.text: I really like the idea of it but poor execution on the directors side made this movie more of a dissapointment than I expected.

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: Freaky vintage found footatge horror talk show? Sign me up!
reviews.text: David Dastmalchian always has this unsetteling aura around him and in this movie he really let's that shine. The practical speciall effects are also so cool to watch when most of us are used to only seeing CGI nowadays. The pacing could be better but overall a very good movie!

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: Becomes scarily more possible the more I think about it
reviews.text: One of the scarient war movies I've seen lately, very violent. I didn't like the ending

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: WHAT. A. RIDE.
reviews.text: Truly a piece of chaotic cinema. So bloody. Everyone dies. Gruesomely. Probably not a movie you would enjoy watching on your own but get a group of friend together and you will have a very fun evening

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: I walked out
reviews.text: I dind't finnish this movie. I thought it was gross and childish and like something a 12 year old boy would have made up.

reviews.name: Tindra
reviews.title: Watch this instead of Elvis
reviews.text: A very gripping story that tell a story you havent seen before. The acting is fantastic. A little slow at times but overall a good watch.

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: No
reviews.text: It feels like the people who made this movie wants us to belive Elvis was some kind of hero when the real story was more of the opposite

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: Maybe you'd like this movie if you love elvis and hate the truth
reviews.text: The movie is predictable and untastefull but the acting is good and the music scenes makes up for some of its flaws.

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: D':
reviews.text: This movie is beautiful both in it's animation and story. I watch this when I can't sleep and it makes me feel better every time.

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: A cute movie
reviews.text: It's a very heartwarming story but I found the main characters a little anoying. I would however watch an entire movie about the mom.

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: Changed the cinema industry for the next decades
reviews.text: RDJ truly embodies Tony Stark in this masterpiece of a superhero movie. Truly set a new standard for what actionmovies could be.

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: Decent watch
reviews.text: I watched this while making dinner and enjoyed it because I didn't have to pay too much attention to it

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: If avengers was animated
reviews.text: Genuinely a really funny movie I think both kids and adults can appreciate.

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: Not anything special
reviews.text: We watched this a few nights ago and already I can't remember any of the major plotpoints. Exept the synth-gag. That was funny.

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: The movie that made me fall in love with fantasy
reviews.text: What is there to say that hasn't alredy been said? A masterpiece of fantasy cinema and a fantastic adaptation of the books.

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: top 3 of all movies I've seen, and the other two are the sequels
reviews.text: This movie, and the original trillogy, is truly in a category of its own. I don't know what happened on the set of this movie but whatever it was, it created true magic.

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: I want Orlando Blooms hair
reviews.text: Objectively this is a fantastic movie and I fully agree with the popular opinion but why does it have to be soooo looong. I can't watch it without taking a break in the middle to go for a walk or something.

reviews.name: GlizzyLizzy
reviews.title: Not as fenominal as the first one but still a very good movie
reviews.text: As colorfull and as much of the great music that makes the first one such a joy, but the story lacks a little and some of the characters feel more like caricatures of themselves.

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: Violence, but its fun!
reviews.text: I had a lot of fun, it's a fun movie and the twist at the end with Peter's mom was interesting

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: Does anyone know where I can get a Guardians of the Galaxy Hoodie?
reviews.text: You can tell that marvel tried to do something different with this one, and it worked fantastically. James Gun was absolutely the right person to direct a movie like this.
